examples: Five, four, three, two, one, zero… We have lift-off.

meanings.def: a temperature, pressure, etc. that is equal to zero on a scale
examples: It was ten degrees below zero last night (= −10°C).
The thermometer had fallen to zero.

meanings.def: the lowest possible amount or level; nothing at all
examples: I rated my chances as zero.

meanings.def: to turn an instrument, control, etc. to zero
